title: Has Riot removed the ARAM post"Victory" Lissadra dialogue?
body: I had waited for half A minute after the "Victory" pop up and Lissadra was still keeping silence.

replies.body: GD we need that dialogue back
It's a known bug we're looking into - thanks for calling it out! =)
I dont know i'll try it tomorrow maybe its a bug normally it appears after 30 sec :o
it only happens when playing lissandra
No it happens whe you win an aram game with any champ
